Content: Hi yall I’m currently restoring a 64 Honda c110 and I’m having a problem where when I tighten down the case half’s the tranny shafts get tight to the point where they won’t spin. I have checked the washers are correct. Here’s a picture of how I have the shafts assembled. Any ideas as too what’s wrong ??
